remarks: A subgroup is a nonempty subset of the group closed under subtraction. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 17-Sep-2015.)
statement:
issubg4.b $e |- B = ( Base ` G ) $.
issubg4.p $e |- .- = ( -g ` G ) $.
issubg4 $p |- ( G e. Grp -> ( S e. ( SubGrp ` G ) <-> ( S C_ B /\ S =/= (/) /\ A. x e. S A. y e. S ( x .- y ) e. S ) ) ) $.
$d .- x y $.
$d B x y $.
$d G x y $.
$d S x y $.
